q: US market share for 2010 rose to 9.2 percent from 8.8 percent in 2009. In Canada, the US automaker saw a market share jump of two percentage points to 13.0 percent for last year. A Downing Street insider told The Scotsman: While the Tommy Sheridan trial is not the reason he resigned, it is fair to say that it certainly didn't help. "It was one of the many things getting in his way and taking up his time that meant he couldn't do his job properly. "He had to spend two or three days preparing for the trial and these things build up. and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach." Internally, Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . In a statement, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. Grizzlies in Carmelo Anthony 's return Allen Iverson raced downcourt and floated an alley-oop lob that Carmelo Anthony shoved one-handed through the hoop for an arena-rattling jam, one that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together, Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. "We know there's a lot of doubt about that."
